attribute.name: itemDisabled
attribute.description: If true, this component will not be saved during state saving.

attribute.name: itemDescription
attribute.description: An optional description for this item.

attribute.name: itemLabel
attribute.description: The locale-specific label that will be displayed to the user for this item.

attribute.name: itemValue
attribute.description: The value of this item, of the same type as the parent component's value.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: An EL expression that refers to a javax.faces.model.SelectItem instance.
